Description:
---------------------
Developed exclusively for the PlayStation Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 3 (PS3 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢) God of War Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® III is the latest installment of the franchise that has sold millions of copies. Scheduled for Santa Monica Studios Sony Computer Entertainment, God of War III will realize the legendary battles with lush graphics and a very elaborate argument that puts Kratos in the center of the carnage and destruction, in search of revenge against the gods desired who betrayed him.
Based on Greek mythology, God of War III is a game for one player who gives life was Spartan warrior, Kratos, the daunting climb to the summit of Mount Olympus and the descent into the dark depths of Hell to get revenge of those who betrayed him. Armed with swords, chains with a new set of weapons and spells at your disposal, Kratos must face the darkest creatures of mythology while twisting puzzle solved ruthless in his mission to destroy Olympus.
Making use of the new game engine created especially for the occasion, and first-order visual technologies, the development team responsible for God of War III has made great strides and have established standards to communicate to the players a realistic experience battlefields. Quadrupling the resolution of textures he displayed God of War Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® II on the PlayStation Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 2, God of War III will present realistic characters, and dynamic lighting effects, an elaborate system of weapons and a host of scenarios that will bring unmistakable realism to the fateful mission of Kratos. Players will join large-scale combat, four times larger than its predecessor.

Features:
---------------------
He admires the power of PlayStation 3 with Kratos savagely tearing the vast army of Olympus, with centaurs general ruthless undead soldiers sending wave after wave.
Gigantic size: Kratos explore areas up to four times larger than those in God of War II, will face entire armies as you travel the back of the Titans: levels with own life, moving as high as the Empire State Building . The size epic God of War III reached levels not seen in the series.
Stylized realism: Players battle through detailed three-dimensional environments and unique, illuminated by thousands of dynamic lights and textures with a resolution four times higher, which gives more realism in the grooves of the muscles, detailed facial expressions and a higher level of brutality and bloodletting detail.
Unique gaming experience: brutal combat, puzzles, complicated, amazing world exploration and absorbing and rewarding end to the epic story of Kratos.
Intricate argument: The storyline in God of War III is the epic conclusion of the franchise, the story will play out according to the ancient traditions of Greek mythology, from the moral consequences of brutal fighting against the gods.
Manipulable creatures: Many of the menacing creatures of Greek mythology, God of War III can be manipulated against their will, and Kratos can use to cross chasms, inflicting a blind fury against their enemies, puzzles and discover secrets, and as a tool to achieve total annihilation.
New weapons and combat system: Novel and deadly weapons like the Cestus, a rugged metal gauntlet with devastating force, and other brutal instruments of war that allow Kratos to learn the techniques such as grappling with ruthless enemies and attacks fragging wall land.
Lighting technologies: Dynamic lighting used in God of War III is possible only through the processing power of synergistic processing units Cell. For example, using the technology of High Dynamic Range Lighting (HDRL by its acronym in English), the camera Kratos first person to emulate the human retina, causing the players a sense of clarity over when Kratos leaves a dark area to spend a sunlit, emulating the human eye's reaction to adapt.
